bibl.title: Καλλίπολις.
bibl.note: The word καλλίπολις was used in connection with four cities: Panos polis, Gaza, Antinoou polis and Hermou polis. It was not an honorary epithet, not even an epithet, because, where καλλίπολις comes at some distance after the name of the city, (or before it), it is used grammatically as a noun.
